name: The Deepest Dungeon Adventure - LD48
description:
Clicker Game made during LD48, with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Use Mouse to play on browser or Touch to play on Android

Programmer - Hugo Susumu Mota Asaga

Graphic Designer - Daniel Motta

Ludum Dare entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/the-deepest-dungeon
